tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE article (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    author VARCHAR NOT NULL,
    publication_date DATE NOT NULL,
    content TEXT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE keyword_occurrences (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  keyword VARCHAR(255),
  article_id INT,
  frequency INT
)

CREATE TABLE articles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  title VARCHAR(255),
  content TEXT,
  publish_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE bias_trends (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trend_name VARCHAR(255),
  trend_description TEXT,
  frequency_count INT
)

CREATE TABLE article (
    article_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    title TEXT,
    publication_date DATE,
    author VARCHAR(50),
    content TEXT
);
